code: import React from'react';import'./TableOfContents.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TableOfContents=_ref=>{let{chapters,activeChapter,setActiveChapter}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"toc",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"\uD83D\uDCCB M\u1EE4C L\u1EE4C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"toc-list",children:chapters.map((chapter,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`toc-item ${activeChapter===index?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>setActiveChapter(index),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"toc-number",children:[index+1,"."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"toc-title",children:chapter.title})]},chapter.id))})]});};export default TableOfContents;
